channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Die Screaming Marianne
channel.desc: Marianne, a nightclub dancer, is on the run from vicious criminals. Trickery and betrayal are around every corner in this suspense-filled thriller. Susan George stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: A detective film set in seventies London's seedy porn trade. A serial killer is targeting women who all appeared in the magazine Playbirds. Contains adult scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: From Bournemouth to Dundee, Alice meets 'cam' couples who are monetising their sex lives by retailing 'authentic sex' online. Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives tailor's assistant Helena and builder Martin the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Wakefield. They have six months to complete it, but will they make a profit when they sell it.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: In Kent, metal worker John tackles a cut-price riverboat restoration using ingenious workarounds. Can he make a home of his own.
